Description: On I-95 at mile marker 135 in the County of Stafford, motorists can expect delays due to a disabled vehicle. The north right shoulder is closed.

Description: On US-13 in the County of Accomack, in the vicinity of Parksley Rd; VA-176E/W, near Parksley road, motorists can expect delays due to a multi-vehicle crash. All south lanes are closed.

Description: On I-95 at mile marker 77.4 in the City of Richmond, motorists can expect delays due to a tractor trailer crash. The north left shoulder and left lane are closed.

Description: On I-64 at mile marker 286.8 in the City of Virginia Beach, near Indian River, motorists can expect delays due to a vehicle crash. The east exit 286B is closed.
